Name: Tequila Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of coin-sized lime zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Margarita without orange liqueur (e.g. a Tommy's Margarita ) is not a "margarita" at all but a tequila sour. The triple sec orange liqueur is one of the things that define the margarita (which sits within the Daisy cocktail family ). The Tequila Sour may lack the ring of a Margarita, but it is a very tasty cocktail nonetheless.
Nutrition: One serving of Tequila Sour contains 188 calories
